languages.text: "Признаться, меня увлекает твое отчаяние, {name}. Даже захотелось узнать, глупость тобою движет или коварство и холодный расчет". {n}Винтерскейл оценивающе почесывает подбородок.{/n} "Что ж, желание проверить, какой длины кинжал ты загонишь мне в спину, весьма велико. Я подумаю над твоим предложением, но большего обещать не могу".

traits.locale_text: "Признаться, меня увлекает твое отчаяние, {name}. Даже захотелось узнать, глупость тобою движет или коварство и холодный расчет". {n}Винтерскейл оценивающе почесывает подбородок.{/n} "Что ж, желание проверить, какой длины кинжал ты загонишь мне в спину, весьма велико. Я подумаю над твоим предложением, но большего обещать не могу".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Frankly, your desperation excites me, {name}. It even makes me want to know whether you are driven by foolishness, or treachery and cool calculation." {n}Winterscale looks at you appraisingly, scratching his chin.{/n} "Well, I'm quite curious to see how large a dagger you might stab me with. I shall think on your offer, but that is the only promise you will get from me."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, меня увлекает твое отчаяние, {name}. Даже захотелось узнать, глупость тобою движет или коварство и холодный расчет". {n}Винтерскейл оценивающе почесывает подбородок.{/n} "Что ж, желание проверить, какой длины кинжал ты загонишь мне в спину, весьма велико. Я подумаю над твоим предложением, но большего обещать не могу".

traits.locale_text: "Frankly, your desperation excites me, {name}. Even makes me want to know whether it is foolishness or treachery and cool calculation that is driving you." {n}Winterscale looks at you appraisingly, scratching his chin.{/n} "Well, I'm quite curious how big of a dagger you would stab me in the back with is. I shall ponder your words, but cannot promise you anything else."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Frankly, your desperation excites me, {name}. I shall ponder your words, but cannot promise you anything else."

traits.locale_text: "Frankly, your desperation excites me, {name}. It even makes me want to know whether you are driven by foolishness, or treachery and cool calculation." {n}Winterscale looks at you appraisingly, scratching his chin.{/n} "Well, I'm quite curious to see how large a dagger you might stab me with. I shall think on your offer, but that is the only promise you will get from me."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «Francamente, me entusiasma su desesperación, {name}. Hace que me pregunte qué le motiva: ¿simple estupidez, o una traición fría y calculada?». {n}Winterscale te mira inquisitivamente mientras se rasca la barbilla.{/n} «Bueno, lo que de verdad me pica la curiosidad es saber cómo de grande será la puñalada que pretende darme por la espalda. Consideraré su propuesta, pero no pienso prometerle nada más».
languages.original_text: "Frankly, your desperation excites me, {name}. It even makes me want to know whether you are driven by foolishness, or treachery and cool calculation." {n}Winterscale looks at you appraisingly, scratching his chin.{/n} "Well, I'm quite curious to see how large a dagger you might stab me with. I shall think on your offer, but that is the only promise you will get from me."

traits.locale_text: «Francamente, me entusiasma su desesperación, {name}. Hace que me pregunte cuáles son sus razones: ¿simple estupidez, o una traición fría y calculada?». {n}Winterscale te mira inquisitivamente mientras se rasca la barbilla.{/n} «Bueno, lo que de verdad me pica la curiosidad es saber cómo de grande será la puñalada que pretende darme por la espalda. Consideraré su propuesta, pero no puedo prometerle nada más».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “老实说，你这种不择手段的态度让我兴奋，{name}。我甚至想知道，你这么做的动机究竟是愚蠢、叛逆，还是冷酷的算计。”{n}温特斯凯尔仔细打量着你，挠着下巴。{/n}“嗯，我真的很好奇，你打算用多狠的手段从背后捅我这一刀。我会仔细考虑你的提议，但别指望我答应你别的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Frankly, your desperation excites me, {name}. It even makes me want to know whether you are driven by foolishness, or treachery and cool calculation." {n}Winterscale looks at you appraisingly, scratching his chin.{/n} "Well, I'm quite curious to see how large a dagger you might stab me with. I shall think on your offer, but that is the only promise you will get from me."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，你这种不择手段的态度让我兴奋，{name}。我甚至想知道，你这么做的动机究竟是愚蠢、叛逆，还是冷酷的算计。”{n}温特斯凯尔仔细打量着你，挠着下巴。{/n}“嗯，我真的很好奇，你打算用多狠的手段从背后捅我这一刀。我会仔细考虑你的话，但别的事情我可保证不了。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Pour être honnête, votre désespoir m'intrigue, {name}. Ça me donne même envie de savoir si vous agissez par naïveté ou si vous avez une idée sournoise derrière la tête. » {n}Winterscale vous jauge du regard en se grattant le menton.{/n} « Je serais curieux de voir la taille du couteau que vous me planteriez dans le dos. Je vais réfléchir à ce que vous avez dit, mais je ne peux rien vous promettre de plus. »
languages.original_text: "Frankly, your desperation excites me, {name}. It even makes me want to know whether you are driven by foolishness, or treachery and cool calculation." {n}Winterscale looks at you appraisingly, scratching his chin.{/n} "Well, I'm quite curious to see how large a dagger you might stab me with. I shall think on your offer, but that is the only promise you will get from me."

traits.locale_text: « Pour être honnête, votre désespoir m'intrigue, {name}. Ça me donne même envie de savoir si vous agissez par naïveté ou si vous avez une idée sournoise derrière la tête. » {n}Winterscale vous jauge du regard en se grattant le menton.{/n} « Je serais curieux de voir la taille du couteau que vous me planteriez dans le dos. Je vais réfléchir à ce que vous avez dit, mais je ne peux rien vous promettre de plus. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「正直、お前の必死さは俺を興奮させてくれるよ、{name}。お前を駆り立てているのが愚かさなのか、それとも裏切りや冷静な計算なのか、知りたくさえなるもんだ」{n}ウィンタースケールは顎を掻きながら、値踏みするようにあなたを見る。{/n}「さて、お前が俺の背中を刺そうとしている短剣がどれほどの大きさなのか、興味は尽きないな。お前の言葉は一応考えてはみるが、それ以上のことは約束できんな」
languages.original_text: "Frankly, your desperation excites me, {name}. It even makes me want to know whether you are driven by foolishness, or treachery and cool calculation." {n}Winterscale looks at you appraisingly, scratching his chin.{/n} "Well, I'm quite curious to see how large a dagger you might stab me with. I shall think on your offer, but that is the only promise you will get from me."

traits.locale_text: 「正直、お前の必死さは俺を興奮させてくれるよ、{name}。お前を駆り立てているのが愚かさなのか、それとも裏切りや冷静な計算なのか、知りたくさえなるもんだ」{n}ウィンタースケールは顎を掻きながら、値踏みするようにあなたを見る。{/n}「さて、お前が俺の背中を刺そうとしている短剣がどれほどの大きさなのか、興味は尽きないな。お前の言葉は一応考えてはみるが、それ以上のことは約束できんな」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Eure Verzweiflung erregt mich offen gestanden, {name}. Ich frage mich sogar, ob Ihr von Dummheit oder Verrat und kalter Berechnung angetrieben werdet." {n}Winterzunder kratzt sich am Kinn und mustert dich prüfend.{/n} "Tja, ich bin neugierig, wie groß das Messer wäre, mit dem Ihr mich erdolcht. Ich werde über Euer Angebot nachdenken, aber das ist das einzige Versprechen, das ich Euch gebe."
languages.original_text: "Frankly, your desperation excites me, {name}. It even makes me want to know whether you are driven by foolishness, or treachery and cool calculation." {n}Winterscale looks at you appraisingly, scratching his chin.{/n} "Well, I'm quite curious to see how large a dagger you might stab me with. I shall think on your offer, but that is the only promise you will get from me."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Verzweiflung erregt mich offen gestanden, {name}. Ich frage mich, ob es Torheit oder Verrat und kalte Berechnung sind, die Euch antreiben." {n}Winterzunder kratzt sich am Kinn und mustert dich prüfend.{/n} "Nun, ich bin neugierig, wie groß der Dolch, den Ihr mir in den Rücken rammen wollt, wohl sein wird. Ich denke über Eure Worte nach, aber mehr kann ich Euch nicht versprechen."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Açıkçası çaresizliğin beni kışkırtıyor {name}. Hatta ahmaklıktan mı yoksa ihanetini mükemmel bir planla süslediğinden dolayı mı böyle hareket ettiğini bilmek istiyorum." {n}Winterscale, çenesini kaşıyarak seni bakışlarıyla ölçüp tartıyor.{/n} "Beni sırtımdan ne kadar büyük bir hançerle bıçaklayacağını oldukça merak ediyorum. Teklifini düşüneceğim ancak benden alacağın tek söz bu olacak."
languages.original_text: "Frankly, your desperation excites me, {name}. It even makes me want to know whether you are driven by foolishness, or treachery and cool calculation." {n}Winterscale looks at you appraisingly, scratching his chin.{/n} "Well, I'm quite curious to see how large a dagger you might stab me with. I shall think on your offer, but that is the only promise you will get from me."
